sub_title: Project Design Coordinator/ Project Manager | Water Specialist - Landell Mills
summary:
Project Manager/ Design Coordinator and Water Specialist in the Environment and Water Division at Landell Mills. In-country experience: Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, Georgia, Nepal, Pakistan, Tajikistan, Uganda, Viet Nam. Project management experience on Asian Development Bank projects covering Integrated Water Resources Management, irrigation feasibility studies/ project design, and managed aquifer recharge.

I hold a Master's degree in International Development Studies from the University of Amsterdam and a Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from Cardiff University. I also have a background working on climate change in Bangladesh, for a research centre (ICCCAD) and as an intern at the UN FAO.
